summary: A boy, looking for his missing father, travels to Germany and uncovers a haunting legacy that a meteorite left behind in the area. Based on H.P. Lovecraft's short novel "The Color Out of Space."
cast: Paul Dorsch|Jürgen Heimüller|Ingo Heise|Philipp Jacobs|Michael Kausch|Olaf Krätke|Marco Leibnitz|Ralf Lichtenberg|Patrick Pierce|Erik Rastetter|Friedrich Schilha|Leander Schmidt|Marah Schneider|Leon Schröder|Alexander Sebastian Curd Schuster|Sebastian Schäfer|Gert Tyarks|Jonas von Lingen|Konstantin Wittfeld|Jonas Zumdohme
keywords: cosmic horror|neo noir|camera shot of hand|camera shot of feet|falling into a river
title: Die Farbe
